metadata.description: Horror returns to comics with Zenescope Entertainment's frightening and fun Grimm Tales of Terror Anthology Volume 2! From the classic literature of Poe and Hawthorne to modern day urban legends, this series re-imagines the creepy stories you know and love for a new generation of readers! Keres, the goddess of death, loves to punish those who she deems deserving of her wrath, and many unsuspecting people who cross her path are about to learn a harsh lesson about morality.
metadata.name: Grimm Tales of Terror Vol. 2
